title: How can we get the demacia icon
body: Every rework had an icon like the piltover icon and the zaun icon where is the Demacia icon ?i can't find it

replies.body: The region icons were unlocked through the [League Universe](http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/) site, and not tied to any specific rework.  I don't have any info on older icons coming back or new ones, but bookmark the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page incase anything comes up.  Let me know if that clears things up.
when will they be given? is it instant after clicking the button?

Summoner icon rewards usually roll out in waves, and not all at once.  There are lots of eligible players so you may not get it right away, and you could see others have it before you.  Hang tight, the goodies will come!  :D

Hello Porocles^^

The link in your original post takes me to the regions tab of the universe site
http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/regions/
instead of the base universe site
http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/
where the icon is.

Just a heads up since the other icons (Piltover and Zaun) were found on their specific region tabs whereas the Demacia one is on the base universe page.

p.s: the icons are amazing and I'm super stoked to collect them all, thank you for helping people get to them Porocles^^

My hero!  Thanks for the assist, I'll be using that link for now on!  <3

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
i no get the Demacia icon ?

People if you would pay attention when ulocking your icon, you would see this message. 

ICON UNLOCKED!
Success! **Look for your icon to be granted by April 20, 2017**. If you don't have it by then, please submit a ticket to Player Support by April 27, 2017.
how can get demacia icon.my champion all mode game {{champion:5}} TRUE DEMACIA

ive tried to delete my browsing history but it didn't work, it still errors and tells me to refresh the page
